html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-02572024-03-25ECCC
ActCanada Water Act
SubjectPrairie Provinces Water Board Master Agreement on Apportionment ** Amendments **
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of the Environment to enter into an AGREEMENT with the Governments of Manitoba, Saskatchewan and Alberta to amend the PRAIRIE PROVINCES WATER BOARD MASTER AGREEMENT ON APPORTIONMENT in order to introduce a framework for the collaborative management of transboundary aquifers and to make other related minor changes.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of the Environment to enter into an AGREEMENT with the Governments of Manitoba, Saskatchewan and Alberta to amend the PRAIRIE PROVINCES WATER BOARD MASTER AGREEMENT ON APPORTIONMENT in order to introduce a framework for the collaborative management of transboundary aquifers and to make other related minor changes.
